hint.en: Nodes to receive Thermostat Operating Statereports
Nodes to receive unsolicited Low BatteryWarnings
Nodes to receive unsolicited Thermostat SetPoint Reports

instruction.en:
Put the thermostat in installer mode by setting DIL switch 1 on the back of the unit to 'ON' position.
 Scroll through the function menu by rotating the dial, select 'L' and press the dial.
  Now the character 'L' starts flashing.
After successful pairing the display changes to 'LP'.
